website_summaries.verdict: Exploring all 4 Alolan Islands, training hundreds of creatures, engaging in intense online battles, and catching them all just scratches the surface of the gigantic worlds of Ultra Sun and Ultra Moon.
pros: Huge online community to trade and battle with
Tons of new Pokémon, like Dewpider, Bruxish, and Oranguru
Tons of classic Legendary Pokémon to find
cons: Players of all ages can enjoy the core games, but online battles can be extra-difficult

customer_reviews.title: I think video games are a good thing for kids of ALL ages
customer_reviews.text: This was an order for my (19 yr old son lol) that loves his Pokemon! He is enjoying it greatly! Had it just over a week and has finished it (beat the game) but still playing it every time I pass his room lol. You know, I think video games are a good thing for kids of ALL ages! It's cool games like these that help keep geeky kids away from the bad stuff!! My son says this is a VERY good version of the game and ANY fan will enjoy it! Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: My ARTasticSelfTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: Got it during the pre order and was worth it. It’s like the first Sun & Moon but with some few differences.
customer_reviews.author: Nika

customer_reviews.title: Very well put together game
customer_reviews.text: Great game. If you hated sun and moon don't get it, but you enjoyed them or never played them, this is a definite upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Product was in new condition and packed well. I bought this in curiosity. I have played Pokemon games here and there since the 90s. I skipped out on playing a couple of the recent new versions before this one. I like how gamefreak has made Pokemon have a pleasant story, not so dark compared to the old. You still have dopey bad guys for some conflict but I'm loving the island story and environment rather than one whole region. The new pokedex (rotodex) was surprising, I did not expect that. Nice game to play when I need to have some down time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall-a good game for the last Pokemon game for the Nintendo ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall-a good game for the last Pokemon game for the Nintendo 3DS. This is NOT a sequel and was never advertised as a sequel (for the many that are giving negative reviews because they thought it was a sequel). There are changes through out the game that make it a little different than the original Sun and Moon games. I haven't played all the way through it yet so I am still waiting to see what other changes and additions they have made.
customer_reviews.author: Gatefan1565

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected at all.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in how much lack of old gen Pokémon this has and how much dialog there is. Just let me play the game instead of giving a new unwanted story line. Not recommended for kids or beginners. I’m a long time adult fan and this game irritates me more than anything. I would skip this entirely and wait for future Switch releases when more content will come out anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Common Sense Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended Pokemon game.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite Pokemon games. Ultra Sun is packed with lots of pokemon, great graphics and trainer customization options. My favorite feature is wonder trading with other players online. Simply pick a pokemon to trade and the system finds a trading partner across the world. I've received many legendary Pokemon and but also few magikarp too. I've played for over 150 hours so far and haven't even completed the main storyline yet.
customer_reviews.author: Gold Panda

customer_reviews.title: Also the Pokemon company hosts international events to obtain some legendary Pokemon so its better to keep the game even after you're done playing ...
customer_reviews.text: Pokemon games tend to be very popular internationally so this game is featured in a ton of languages such as Korean, Japanese, Chinese, French, Italian, English etc. Also the Pokemon company hosts international events to obtain some legendary Pokemon so its better to keep the game even after you're done playing it. You can enter game codes from Game Stop during events featured in America. Overall, the most frustrating part is catching Pokemon because it's a lot harder to catch them compared to previous Pokemon games. It's better if you stock up on different balls if you encounter wild Pokemon.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Great game. Improvement from Sun, but could have been better!
customer_reviews.text: Let's see.... They made the intro faster to where you choose your starter. Added some new Pokemon (Ultra Beast) Added some transformations for the legends. Added minigames Added Ultra Space for easy Shiny Pokémon including legendary Pokémon Added new Z moves Added a bit longer story The post game added the Battle Agency (basically Battle Factory), a new Team Rocket and battles against Giovanni, Maxi, Archie, Cyrus, Ghestis and Lysandre.
customer_reviews.author: Safn

customer_reviews.title: Overall the game had a faster pace than the vanilla games and like most pokemon games was a blast to play
customer_reviews.text: The differences between the base game and this updated "Ultra" version was really refreshing. Overall the game had a faster pace than the vanilla games and like most pokemon games was a blast to play. However, there aren't many new pokemon (about 2 or 3) and after you've beat it entirely the drive to replay or continue play it is a bit low because there isn't quite enough new content to keep bringing you back for more. If you are a competitive player this game is great because move tutors are available and the BP is not only easy to obtain but fun as well thanks to the mantine surf minigame!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan DiPasquale

customer_reviews.title: Yay yay yay!
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend bought moon and I got sun. We can't stop playing! There's soooooo much more to do now (we boy started with blue and red); the game has developed a lot in both good ways and bad ones. In our opinion the opposing trainers are far too easy to beat and it's tidious to keep up with the Pokemon who want to "play." Outs still an all time favorite and the graphics, just wow. Everything is cute and tiny and exceeds your expectations. We haven't had any issues or bugs. Great game, get it!
customer_reviews.author: Boobookittyphuck

customer_reviews.title: He LOVES it and it provides endless hours of fun, along with plenty of replay value
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this game for my son who had saved up his birthday money from this Summer in anticipation of this game. He LOVES it and it provides endless hours of fun, along with plenty of replay value! My youngest can't wait to get the other version for Christmas hopefully so he can have just as much fun as his brother is having! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: K. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Ultra sun
customer_reviews.text: Great game i prefer this one over sun and moon. There are tons of stuff added but early game is slow and feel like nothing has change but it will pay off. If you are just a casual player who only play for the storyline then this might dissapoint you.
customer_reviews.author: vinh

customer_reviews.title: Weak storyline
customer_reviews.text: A tad to technical for my personal complaints over technical lack of subject such as Rifting with the necromaza enhanced sologaleo or lunala, The character build in pokemon sun-moon US-UM Is quite solid but has a rather blunt limit to its capabilitys unlink black and white 1 and 2.
customer_reviews.author: charles elder

customer_reviews.title: Sure there were a few minor changes, but this ...
customer_reviews.text: Sure there were a few minor changes, but this definitely gives people a chance to play the new game without buying the first game or restarting the previous game! Pokemon is always worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Reagan Bechard

customer_reviews.title: Great Game. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I don't see why many people are complaining that this is just an enhanced Sun/Moon and that it doesn't have a lot of new content (which I highly disagree on) since Pokemon has always done this with their games. There are a lot of quality of life changes along with many more pokemon available and a different story that makes it superior to Sun/Moon. Graphics are also much more vibrant. If you liked Sun/Moon you will love this but if you didn't I don't really recommend purchasing this game. I think it's a great game and a great way to finish off the Pokemon games for the 3ds. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Offer fedex delivery on every other when you get out in the sticks FedEx is the best and most reliable
customer_reviews.text: Game was suppose to be here by 8pm it should up at 11pm after getting a notice from UPS saying it will be delivered between the 18th to the 21st by 8pm. Game is everything and then done my son with asburgers loves it
customer_reviews.author: Robert Calhoun Jr

customer_reviews.title: my baby nephew loved this
customer_reviews.text: lets get real what kid doesn't like pokemon? I bought this for my nephew as a Christmas gift and he loved it (he had to opened the gift earlier because there wont be a celebration of Christmas because of a family tragedy ) so all in all this a perfect gift for a kid no matter his age :)
customer_reviews.author: eduardo dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Literally the same as the Original game
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed to see that the storyline and playthrough are almost identical to regular Pokemon Sun and Moon. I really appreciated that Black and White II had a fresh story but I guess that was too much to ask from modern Nintendo :/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Enthralling and poketastic!
customer_reviews.text: I love Pokemon. Its no sun rehash. Its a different storyline, but on the islands still. Not nearly as "hand holdy" and very fun. Been playing for over 20 years, and still enthralled by this game!
customer_reviews.author: Emaline O'Keefe

customer_reviews.title: and it's fun as always with multiple great features and access to ...
customer_reviews.text: It's Pokemon, and it's fun as always with multiple great features and access to more Pokemon from previous generations. But this is definitely not a game for someone who has thoroughly played through the original Sun and Moon and is looking for some new story content (doesn't really happen until near the end and postgame). If you have not played Sun and Moon before, this is the best version to get in terms of amount of game content.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Stoltenberg

customer_reviews.title: Overall amazing!
customer_reviews.text: A lot better than Sun/Moon. I am a returning player and absolutely love it, the game had a story that made me want to keep playing, it's amazing. With more Pokemon available in the wild you can make a diverse team, Necrozma is a truly terrifying Pokemon that makes the story and gameplay very suspenseful and addicting. Overall a lot better than Sun/Moon, if you are not a returning player from the Alola Region definitely get this game over the original Sun/Moon
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Solano

customer_reviews.title: We should probably have saved our money. It's just ...
customer_reviews.text: We should probably have saved our money. It's just a non-3D version of the Sun game that was released a year ago and a sneaky way by Nintendo to get more money out of the same game one more year.
customer_reviews.author: Fin Bil

customer_reviews.title: Could've been better.
customer_reviews.text: Pokemon games before gen 5 are way better than the those past it, like Omega Ruby and its storytelling, and Soulsivers post game is AMAZING with a whole nother region! Games now just dont have the same feeling, especially sword and shield. Damn I sound like a boomer. PS, I tried start shining hunting (specifically rowlette) but the cutscene is SO long compared to other games!
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Great game! slightly harder than the original
customer_reviews.text: If you skipped Pokemon Moon/Sun this version might be for you. This version adds more difficulty and more Pokemon (not new, but more). the 40 minute tutorial from the prior game now feels like 10-15 (although I haven't timed it and have only played through the game once.
customer_reviews.author: GTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try
customer_reviews.text: Arrived pretty quickly and no damages. I put off buying the game because I thought it would be too similar to the original, but I actually enjoyed the remake more. The story feels more complete and there's more to do.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great Game!
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely love this game. It's always Pokemon this and that. Great gift for the holidays or birthdays and from what I've been told it's far better than the previous Sun and Moon. Guess Ultra makes everything better.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Pokemon Game
customer_reviews.text: I've played several different Pokemon games, and have enjoyed them all. Ultra Sun is no exception. Maybe too many cutscenes for my liking, but not enough of an annoyance for me to dislike it in anyway, really.
customer_reviews.author: A Recluse

customer_reviews.title: The game is a lot of fun! It's a little different from other Pokemon games
customer_reviews.text: The game is a lot of fun! It's a little different from other Pokemon games, but it's just as fun! The characters are all great, the graphics are awesome, and the gameplay is very easy to get the hang of. There are plenty of sidequests to work on to make this game last a little longer, but the main story is long enough itself to make the game worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: V. Phalen

customer_reviews.title: Best Pokemon Game Yet
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this series and this game did not let me down. There are tons of awesome adventures, pokemon, and applications. My favorite things are being able to use pokemon I've caught from previous generations of the game and playing online with other players around the world. Although there is one main quest, you definitely will want to continue playing/growing/exploring once that main quest is achieved.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky G

customer_reviews.title: Delivered much more than expected
customer_reviews.text: This game delivered so much more than I thought it would. It has been an absolute blast and the things they added to the story make the game very immersive and memorable. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: FuegoFiddle

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and get it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Pokemon addict, while this game does not have a TON of new material, it has a lot of new features which are pretty awesome, not to mention you can catch every single legendary in the game as well! The gameplay is also much more difficult than it was originally in Sun/Moon - you will and can black out a lot... The different storyline becomes much more apparent later into the game.
customer_reviews.author: Manga Otaku

customer_reviews.title: My son loved it. It does follow suit with previous Pokemon ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it. It does follow suit with previous Pokemon iterations. That being said Pokemon games are known to follow through with similar formulas that were used since the original release of Red.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Good game overall same feel as first pokemon sun/moon
customer_reviews.text: I love the pokemon company but they try to milk there games by giving you the same game with a couple little new stuff here and there. Liked the game but overall it felt like the same experience as the first one
customer_reviews.author: Jose Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Scam!!! Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: My nephew has been wanting this game for awhile now so I decided to purchase it for him, he was so excited once he found out that I purchased it and we just had to wait for it to be delivered. We’ll we got it today the game card shows to be Pokémon Ultra Sun but once we inserted it to his DS it was a total different game (Pes 2011 soccer game), this is so frustrating, my nephew was really disappointed. Be careful y’all
customer_reviews.author: Yadi

customer_reviews.title: Pokerman is hero man
customer_reviews.text: I'm only frustrated with myself that I bought the original Sun first. I wasted my time on that one, since these games are so much more comprehensive I wish I had played it first. That being said, the games are a blast and well worth your time.
customer_reviews.author: JtheSuperSlug

customer_reviews.title: Feels more like a spiritual successor to the series.
customer_reviews.text: I've played the 1st, 2nd and 3rd gen games, but skipped gens 4-6. I came back to play Ultra Sun, and I haven't had this much fun playing Pokemon since I first played. The new mechanics, the great story, and the new visuals really stand out. I feel like all my imaginings and ideas of Pokemon from the old 8-bit days have come to life. I've beaten the main story in the game already, and there is still so much to do. I'll be playing this one for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Harley Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Older games are more fun
customer_reviews.text: Not even close to as much fun as previous games. Not worth the buy. Introduction of fairy types and changing old Pokémon types ruined the game. Too much dialogue. Dumbed down excessively - no puzzles or thinking required. Mindlessly boring.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Newsom

customer_reviews.title: doesn't really feel worth it to be honest.
customer_reviews.text: I think its safe to say hardcore pokemon fans can skip this if they're really not up to it. you get more pokemon sure, but a lesser story. great for new comers and actual 10 year olds but not the game any long term hard core player needs.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Natal

customer_reviews.title: Best sequel in the series so far
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the first in the series. I also love that at the beginning there are more varieties of pokemon available compared to the first. I love the little interactions with various pokemon and the multiple side quests that the game provides. It really makes the series more fleshed out.
customer_reviews.author: Noé Sue

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Looking back to where pokemon games started, it is truly incredible that we're here now. Love the character customization options.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: but different" is the best way to describe pokemon ultra sun
customer_reviews.text: "The same, but different" is the best way to describe pokemon ultra sun. While extremely similar to pokemon sun, this game changes it up with enough new things to make it feel different.
customer_reviews.author: Jubilant

customer_reviews.title: I really like this game
customer_reviews.text: Note: This is from James and Debbie's daughter. I really like this game, it can be very challenging and frustrating, but overall, it's a decent game. But that's only because this's my first game and that I didn't play the two original games. So I wouldn't recommend this game to anyone who already played the previous two games and expected something entirely new.
customer_reviews.author: James & Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but the same as Sun
customer_reviews.text: It's basically the same as Sun, but with a few extra features. The dimension jumping is cool, but not enough content to warrant being a whole new game.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Scott Laufenberg

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it says it is.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it says it is. A brand new Pokémon Ultra Sun for the Nintendo. Just like in the store, without looking around trying to find some one to unlock and get the item for you.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: POKEMON
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to catch a shinny but this is a truly fun game. I've played over 40 hours so far and there is so much to do. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mike11058

customer_reviews.title: pokemon sun 2.0
customer_reviews.text: I loved this version of Pokemon sun. It improved upon the vanilla version in every way. Highly suggest any Pokemon fan to get this game. This is supposed to be the last game Pokemon will make for this platform, before going all in for the switch console. So with this being the swan song I suggest going out and picking this up if you haven't already.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal H.

customer_reviews.title: Great story
customer_reviews.text: This game has a great story angraphics, and I played through it four times in a row at one point. Doesn't get old.
customer_reviews.author: Isis Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Seller is cool, game is kind of disappointing
customer_reviews.text: No complaints to the seller, game overall wasn’t what I was expecting it to be. As a fan of Pokemon since childhood, pretty disappointed. Hopefully the switch games are better.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Pokemon Home
customer_reviews.text: Great sale price especially since pokemon home is released and I can transfer pokemon to pokemon home
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic :)
customer_reviews.text: Love this gen overall I love the characters and story :) and the music is pretty good to can't wait for the new games to come out and see what's new :D
customer_reviews.author: Spirit

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL GAME! C:
customer_reviews.text: VERY enjoyable, lots of things to do after you finish just like any other Pokemon game~ Neat take and slight redo of the original Sun c:
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: My sin loves this game and it works great with his DS. He has one of the original 3DS that came out.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Robertson

customer_reviews.title: it's a nice change of pace compared to previous iterations of the ...
customer_reviews.text: As with many of the more recent releases, there is quite a bit of hand-holding. That being said, it's a nice change of pace compared to previous iterations of the franchise. There is a certain part of the game which is VERY out of place and outrageously difficult compared to how the rest of the game was though. Passed the game along to a friend for further enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: John Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great game, super fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: This game got to us way soon then expected and is truly my favorite Pokémon game out there. Can’t wait to order Pokémon sword and shield!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S.

customer_reviews.title: Not 4 kids
customer_reviews.text: Besides sword and shield this game is so fun has something for everybody
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: New gen brings a lot to the table
customer_reviews.text: Approachable for new fans, refreshing for seasoned vets (started with Leaf Green), and shakes up the formula enough to make the experience feel fresh and new.
customer_reviews.author: Luyou Sun

customer_reviews.title: ONE OF THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: This is great game! Whether you've played Pokémon for twenty years like I have, or are just starting out, or even getting this to pass on the Pokémon legacy to someone you love... this is one of the best Pokémon games ever. Came fast, and in perfect working condition. I have zero complaints...
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Ashmore

customer_reviews.title: Son Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a Christmas gift for my Pokemon-loving 9-year-old. He LOVES this game. He said that there are great new features added to the game and he actually hasn't beaten the game in a day so that's a plus!
customer_reviews.author: bksimmons

customer_reviews.title: Good game
customer_reviews.text: My second copy to be bought and excited for next year to play it
customer_reviews.author: José

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter. She found it very fun to play and plans on taking it with on our vacation. I'm happy with the cost and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Johnson-Larson

customer_reviews.title: Played Sun, and relived it here
customer_reviews.text: Granted if you didn’t absolutely love Pokemon Sun, you shouldn’t buy this. Also if you played previously, it’s essentially the same at the first game with a few add ons. Nothing nostalgic like where the anime is going, but definitely worth my time.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Short and easy game
customer_reviews.text: I got the product early and i did play the game, it was way easier than any pokemon game i ever played and quick to defeat. I enjoyed alittle of the new features and pokemon with the beautiful scenery.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: I can hardly get going because I feel like I just did this
customer_reviews.text: Ugh. It's wayyyyy too similar to the last game. I can hardly get going because I feel like I just did this.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Stein

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Not much different than Pokemon Sun. Was disappointed with the add-ons that were supposed to heighten the gameplay. I've been a fan of Pokemon games since the first generation, but these games just aren't as fun as all the others to me.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Great game very well enjoyed
customer_reviews.text: The perfect game for All Pokemon fans. Great game lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Releasing 2 "enhanced versions" and not making any real changes... nice. The original wasn't great and this is just the same game again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Game is great if you have not played Sun or Moon
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT buy this game if you already own Moon or Sun . It is basically a re-hashing of the story, with minor tweaks. Game is great if you have not played Sun or Moon.
customer_reviews.author: HishamAC

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Husband was very satisfied, came on time and good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great even for those kids who aren't really gamers
customer_reviews.text: At the moment, this is my granddaughter's favorite game. I think part of it is that a nine year old who isn't really a gamer can figure it out and enjoy it. If your kid loves Pokemon, this is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Kastner

customer_reviews.title: Gameplay can be tedious. Neat new features
customer_reviews.text: Gameplay can be tedious. Neat new features, but good Lord the beginning of the game takes a loooong time to get through. It starts and stops constantly to point out obvious things that a good game should lead you to without holding hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used but in great condition
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, though I did check to see if there was an old save file and there was. So it was used, but so far everything looks good to me. The box is in great condition and the game is in clean good working order. Giving this a 5 stars as it came on time and is working well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Its Predecessor
customer_reviews.text: It came in earlier for me and let me tell you that this is better than Sun and Moon. It has a different story, some new pokemon, and new features. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jook

customer_reviews.title: Same as Sun
customer_reviews.text: It's a good game, but I didn't know that the the normal and ultra versions are basically the same. Wish it was more like the black/white and black2/white2 series with a continued storyline or something.
customer_reviews.author: Sindy Huang

customer_reviews.title: graphics are amazing, the amount people talk is too much
customer_reviews.text: graphics are amazing, the amount people talk is too much, the gym thing is weird and a bit annoying. its nice to be able to go around most grass if you want.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Kids still playing this one  after many months
customer_reviews.text: Kids play this one a lot, a good purchase with replay value.
customer_reviews.author: J. Levine

customer_reviews.title: A very fun Pokémon game
customer_reviews.text: This game is very fun to play. This alternate story line versus the original one is very interesting and gives a new level of challenge for the player.
customer_reviews.author: StarDragonExe

customer_reviews.title: ... worth it if you have then I honestly wouldn't waste my time with this unless you're really into
customer_reviews.text: if you haven't played sun or moon then this is definitely worth it if you have then I honestly wouldn't waste my time with this unless you're really into pokemon
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the original.
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing this game does that Sun/Moon didn't do better. It's almost identical to the original, and the parts that aren't identical are actually WORSE.
customer_reviews.author: Xander V

customer_reviews.title: Solid game, met expectations
customer_reviews.text: The game was exactly what I expected it would be, it came on time and was a lot easier to play through than the original pokemon sun. I would say that for those looking to buy either this one or regular sun, get this one as it is for sure the more "complete" game. For those looking to get this in addition to regular sun, not much is different and this game is more akin to an emerald or crystal version than say a black 2 white 2. Very fun overall and very glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Q

customer_reviews.title: Great Game!
customer_reviews.text: I adore this game. However, I don't think it's necessary to purchase both the original Sun/Moon and Ultra Sun/Moon. Although the original Sun/Moon games were wonderful and groundbreaking in the Pokemon series, Ultra Sun/Moon is more polished and includes all the content of the previous games (and more).
customer_reviews.author: Hannah V.

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Was what we were expecting and wanting. It arrived in great condition!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Let unleash the gamer inside me
customer_reviews.text: Pokemon its the best of all saga i think and this is no different!
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Nadal

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play
customer_reviews.text: My sons said it was great and can't wait for a new pokemon game! He is 12.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my son and he loved it
customer_reviews.author: Momof4kids

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun game! The little blonde guy with emo hair is a cutie. Worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s not a continuation from Sun/Moon, it’s an alternate version
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the game. There were a few things i expected from it but overall it’s a solid one. The experience from the previous one (Sun/Moon) it’s not that different, there’s only a few changes in the story, and they added new locations as well (alongside with more spotlight for the ultra beast origins). it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Jean P Martin

customer_reviews.title: Pokémon Master
customer_reviews.text: It brings a lot of nostalgia from when I was kid it was fun and good add to the collection
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: A nice "reboot"
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad it's not just another recycled game. Ultra Sun is different enough to make it an entirely new experience in comparison to the original Sun.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Haywood

customer_reviews.title: Game was just released before Thanksgiving, and Amazon had the best price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this game for my grandson who loves playing these games. He had asked for this game and started playing it right away. He said it was a great game and started moving up the levels right away
customer_reviews.author: Sherry L Beck

customer_reviews.title: Pokemon never changes
customer_reviews.text: I found this game to be much more hard than ultra moon. I enjoyed it alot.
customer_reviews.author: Shion

customer_reviews.title: Works on 2ds
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was good. Delivery was quick. Worked great on my child’s 2ds. No problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: NativeBetty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the cost. Nice design & spot on.
customer_reviews.author: wnb016

customer_reviews.title: My son loved this game
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this game. It's sad that more people didn't continue on and play it as he was a little alone in playing it within his circle of friends. I would love to see a Switch version of this game.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan L

customer_reviews.title: but really this game is so much like sun/moon, I don't have to say to much ...
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars for Pokemon game, but really this game is so much like sun/moon, I don't have to say to much if you are Pokemon fan because that's what Nintendo always doing, but if you are not seriously Pokemon fan, don't spend your money on duplicate game like this, it's not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Yi Ye

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love the new re telling of the story from the old games!
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Very fun, challenging if you turn off exp share
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun Pokemon game, been playing Pokemon my whole life and this is probably my favorite of the series. For those who want a challenge, turn off the exp share for the whole game and it gets quite hard but very rewarding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift~he loves it & it arrived on time!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining. Better than first one.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed playing this. I found it more fun than the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Alan M.

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive game.
customer_reviews.text: The product was late. (Didn't really care.) The product came with dirt and oil on cartrige. The worst thing was the game was not actually pokemon ultra sun. The label said pokemon ultra sun but the game read as a 2011 soccer game. Started return process today (5/16/20)
customer_reviews.author: WhyDoYouCare

product_meta.title: Pokémon Ultra Sun - Nintendo 3DS
product_meta.description: Platform:Nintendo 3DS| Edition:Ultra SunA new light shines on the Alola region! Take on the role of a Pokemon Trainer and encounter Pokemon, uncover new tales, and unravel the mystery behind the two forms reminiscent of the Legendary Pokemon. These new titles power up the Pokemon Sun and Pokemon Moon content with new story additions and features, earning them the name “Ultra!” Another adventure is about to begin!
feature_bullets: A new light shines on the Alola region!
Take on the role of a Pokemon Trainer and encounter Pokemon, uncover new tales, and Unravel the mystery behind the two forms reminiscent of the legendary Pokemon.
These new titles power up the Pokemon Sun and Pokemon moon content with new story additions and features, earning them the name “ultra!” another adventure is about to begin!
Entertainment Software Rating Board (ESRB) Content Description: Mild cartoon violence
Destructoid: "A hallmark of excellence.";GameSpot: "...a fun-filled and uplifting Pokemon adventure…"
